Sentencas: A stable cathode with high catalytic activity toward oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) plays a key role in the commercialization of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The cathode material Ba0.8Sr0.2Co0.7Fe0.2Nb0.1O3-delta is synthesized by solid-state reaction method.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The introduction of Sr result in a higher porosity and a lower thermal expansion coefficient.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: It optimizes the concentration ratio of small polarons and oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The overall reaction of Ba0.8Sr0.2Co0.7Fe0.2Nb0.1O3-delta cathode is determined by three main ORR processes.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The change in ratelimiting step are related to partial pressure of oxygen.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The ionization process of oxygen atoms is the main ratelimiting step when PO2 is higher than 0.01 atm.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The addition of Sr2+ accelerates the ionization process of oxygen atoms and leads to the acceleration of the whole ORR process.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The temperature mainly affects the oxygen transport on the cathode surface and in the cathode bulk.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode

Sentencas: The transfer of oxygen ions to the electrolyte and the ionization of oxygen atoms are accelerated at high temperatures.
Titulo: The promoting effect of Sr-doping on the oxygen reduction activity of perovskite cathode
